pages.text: In case your power is feruchemical, you will have to get a $(l:metal_mind_entry/rings)Ring$() or a $(l:metal_mind_entry/bands)Bracer$() that contains the metal of your corresponding power (I suggest you start with a ring, which will cost less resources), and equip it in one of the slots you will have on the sides of your armor.

pages.title: How to use?
pages.text: $(br) Once the bracer or ring is equipped, you must press the bound Feruchemical Selector wheel key and select your power to start storing it (storing will give you negative effects depending on your power, but don't worry, then you can use these reserves in your favor).
